title: Good luck with that
author: VD
content_html:
Podhoretz the Younger sees only one hope to stop Hillary:

[S]he can’t be stopped from getting the Democratic nomination. Today’s news is that Mark Warner, the former governor of Virginia, has decided not to run for president in 2008. If there is no credible challenger to Hillary on what might be called her “right,” then there’s no scenario according to which her base vote is split. As I keep telling you, don’t imagine you will be spared a Hillary presidency by the Democratic party, which will nominate her — or by some naturally occurring phenomenon. It’s going to be the GOP, running smart, that will prevent it.

Right, all that’s needed is running smart… from the gang that thinks opposing illegal immigration is a terrible idea and banning online gaming is an imperative.

I, for one, will welcome our new reptilesbian overlordess.
content_text:
Podhoretz the Younger sees only one hope to stop Hillary:
[S]he can’t be stopped from getting the Democratic nomination. Today’s news is that Mark Warner, the former governor of Virginia, has decided not to run for president in 2008. If there is no credible challenger to Hillary on what might be called her “right,” then there’s no scenario according to which her base vote is split. As I keep telling you, don’t imagine you will be spared a Hillary presidency by the Democratic party, which will nominate her — or by some naturally occurring phenomenon. It’s going to be the GOP, running smart, that will prevent it.
Right, all that’s needed is running smart… from the gang that thinks opposing illegal immigration is a terrible idea and banning online gaming is an imperative.
I, for one, will welcome our new reptilesbian overlordess.
